page.title: 05Industries in Featherstone
page.content: Lin Pac is the largest manufacturing works in the town.There are two works, one producing cardboard boxes of all types including egg boxes and the next producing polystyrene goods such as supermarket food trays.The Lin Pac company came to Featherstone 25 years ago.The development of the supermarket shopping system has encouraged growth at Lin Pac as it relies heavily on pre packed goods.In 1984 the factory was extended and its polystyrene trays are distributed all over the country.The company employs approximately 400 men working an uninterrupted seven day week on three shifts,rotating the days off.Recently they bought a field to be developed as a sports area.Today they only have a social club for workers. There are two small clothing works in the town mainly employing women.
